msgSnippet: Hi there, AFAIK the direct VAJ integration support is canceld in JUnit from version 3.4 and up. However I m using JUnit 3.4 with VAJ3.5 with the test-ui

Hi there,

AFAIK the direct VAJ integration support is canceld in JUnit from version
3.4 and up. However I'm using JUnit 3.4 with VAJ3.5 with the test-ui
directory and default.ini file from JUnit 3.2 and it works.

Werner
  -----Ursprungliche Nachricht-----
  Von: Leon Webster [mailto:leon@...]
  Gesendet: Donnerstag, 15. Februar 2001 04:31
  An: junit@yahoogroups.com
  Betreff: [junit] junit 3.5 and visua age 3.5


  I am sure I am having a pre-mature "senior moment" here, but perhaps
someone
  can help me.  I am having trouble installing JUnit as a Visual Age for
Java
  tool.

  The instructions for running Junit from within Visual Age say
  "1. copy the directory vaj\tools\test-ui into the VAJ_INSTALLDIR\ide\tools
  directory"

  I can't locate the directory "vaj\tools\test-ui" in JUnit3.5.zip.  I am
  pretty sure it was there in JUnit 3.2 (but not absolutely sure).  I can't
  find a place on JUnit.org to download the file.

  Can some one point me in the right direction?

  Thanks much.

  Leon Webster


        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor

                    www.  .com

  junit-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com
